name: Virtusoft
overview:
Virtusoft, since its inception, has been a proven global technology firm with a mission of maintaining quality, integrity, technical skills and confidentiality & privacy of our clients. Virtusoft is capable of delivering on and off-shore consulting with cost efficient technical / business solutions and services to help our clients operate more productively and profitably utilizing our full spectrum of specialized staffing and project implementation services.

Assess Your Consulting Needs Virtusoft’s IT Strategy professionals help our clients determine the right set of IT investments to help deliver on corporate strategy, and then help prioritize those investments for maximum results. In the longer term, we provide guidance in developing the capability to determine and manage IT investments properly, including the sourcing and alliances necessary to deliver on the strategy effectively.

Virtusoft Methodology The Virtusoft Methodology is a phased project rollout method designed to quickly see the value of your investment. Virtusoft consultants use the method to identify and address key strategic and tactical issues, and to develop a blueprint for the progress of the project. The Virtusoft Methodology optimizes every aspect of our services for your particular company… from needs assessment… to deployment and training… to ongoing hosting and solution enhancements. You get a clearly delineated, end-to-end plan designed to help your company: Optimize time and resources Develop a scalable, adaptable long-term solution strategy Achieve significant competitive advantage Integrate world-class solutions at an affordable price
